description: Portable sanctuary: outer court (altar, laver), Holy Place (table, lampstand, incense altar), Most Holy Place (ark of covenant with mercy seat).
materials: Gold, silver, bronze, blue/purple/scarlet yarn, fine linen, acacia wood, goat hair, ram skins, sea cow hides.
symbolism: Ark: God's presence. Mercy seat: atonement. Lampstand: light of God. Table: bread of presence.
